org.cougaar.core.qos.ca
Class ConnectionSpec

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.qos.ca.ConnectionSpec

public class ConnectionSpec
extends java.lang.Object

This simple struct provides a specification for a role in particular CoordinationArtifact. It's used by RolePlayers to get themselves connected.

Field Summary
 java.lang.String ca_kind
          The Coordination Artifact kind.
 java.util.Properties ca_parameters
          A plist that can distinguish the instances of the given Coordination Artifact kind from one another.
 java.lang.String role
          The specific role for the given Coordination Artifact kind.
 java.util.Properties role_parameters
          A plist includes all the instance-specific data for a particular Facet instance.

Field Detail

ca_kind

public java.lang.String ca_kind
The Coordination Artifact kind. Each kind has one or more roles, and each role is visible to clients as a 'facet'. The specific role for any particular Connection spec is given in the 'role' instance variable.

role

public java.lang.String role
The specific role for the given Coordination Artifact kind.

ca_parameters

public java.util.Properties ca_parameters
A plist that can distinguish the instances of the given Coordination Artifact kind from one another.

role_parameters

public java.util.Properties role_parameters
A plist includes all the instance-specific data for a particular Facet instance.
